    )]

              y=['SW_IN_1_1_1','LW_IN_1_1_1','SW_OUT_1_1_1', 'LW_OUT_1_1_1'],
              color=['red','red','blue','blue'],
              style=['-','--','-','--'])

ax.grid()
fig.autofmt_xdate()
